page.title: 12GAMES IN CHURCHDOWN
page.content: On Sundays I like going swimming at Gloucester Leisure Centre with my family.I also play football at John Danial's Playing Field with my friends. At school I play football in the winter and cricket in the summer.Our school is the Gloucestershire under-11's cricket champions and we are playing The West Midlands next week.If we win we go into the national finals. At school I play netball in the winter and Danish rounders in the summer.This is a bit different from ordinary rounders as it is easier.I like playing leapfrog with my friends on the field and we also play hide-and-seek and dub-dub-in.When it is hot we go swimming and sometimes we play tennis.
